Suffix - Class in Unnamed Package
This class creates a suffix array by comparing all suffixes of the text.

SuffixArray - Record Class in Unnamed Package
This class manages an array of integers (suffix array) and the text on which the suffix array has been built.

SuffixArrayBuilder - Class in Unnamed Package
